other_notes: Write any other notes or comments for the order

fatal_error_contact_us: Still facing the same issue? Contact Us

custom_order_notes_main: Please follow the following rules before uploading your image:
custom_order_notes_l2: In case of choosing wood carving, upload an image that contains the text you would like to have on the product
custom_order_notes_l3: This text might be a name, a date, a quote or a combination of them.
number_of_faces_note: How many people are in the image?
number_of_faces_hint: If the image does not contain people, write 0
number_of_faces_err1: Number of people in the image is required.
number_of_faces_err2: People number must be greater than or equal 0

sku_code_err1: SKU code must not exceed 20 characters

backup_note: Please contact the developers team as soon as possible if you had any problems doing the backup
product_details_main: Our products and their delivery times:
decoration_tableaus_material_l2: Has two hangers on the back to be hanged either horizontally or vertically.
decoration_tableaus_material_l3: Has an extra protection screen to protect it from water and dust.
decoration_tableaus_material_l4: Has a leather-like texture and can cleaned easily.
decoration_tableaus_delivery_l2: Delivery to a metro station: 2-3 days
mersal_material_l1: An envelope made of heavy paper(canson).
mersal_delivery_l1: Delivery to a home: within 7 days
mersal_delivery_l2: Delivery to a metro station: within 7 days
digital_effect_portrait_material_l2: Has two hangers on the back to be hanged either horizontally or vertically.
digital_effect_portrait_material_l3: Has an extra protection screen to protect it from water and dust.
digital_effect_portrait_material_l4: Has a leather-like texture and can cleaned easily.
digital_effect_portrait_delivery_l2: Delivery to a metro station: 2-3 days
natural_wood_material_l2: It has text carved in it. You can write:
natural_wood_delivery_l1: Delivery to a home: within 7 days
natural_wood_delivery_l2: Delivery to a metro station: within 7 days
other_drawing_styles_material_l2: Kept in a black wood frame.

other_drawing_styles_delivery_l2: Delivery to a metro station: within 7 days
